import "./FinalPrice.css" import { useDate } from "../../context/date-context" import { DateSelector } from "../DateSelector/DateSelector" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" export const FinalPrice = ({singleHotel}) =>{ const {price,rating} = singleHotel const navigate = useNavigate() const {guests,checkinDate,checkOutDate,dateDispatch} = useDate() const handleGuestChange = (event) =>{ dateDispatch({ type:"GUESTS", payload : event.target.value }) } const handleReserveClick = ()=>{ navigate(`/confirm-booking/stay/${_ic}`) } return(

Rs. {price}night

star {rating}

Guests

{ guests <= 0 ? : {guests} guests }
Rs. {price} x 2 nights Rs {price * 2}
Service Fee Rs 200
Total Rs Rs. {price * 2 + 200}
) }
